docs.lead_paragraph: Books about the history of smallpox, Shakespeare’s impact, Anna Politkovskaya’s journalistic work in Russia and growing up in the Southern Baptist church.
docs.snippet: Books about the history of smallpox, Shakespeare’s impact, Anna Politkovskaya’s journalistic work in Russia and growing up in the Southern Baptist church.

docs.lead_paragraph: William B. Kannel, a cardiovascular epidemiologist whose work helped to identify and sought to rout the culprits behind heart attacks, strokes and other cardiovascular diseases, died on Saturday in Natick, Mass. He was 87. The cause was cancer, his family said. At his death, Dr. Kannel was emeritus professor of medicine and public health at the Boston University School of Medicine.

headline.main: W. B. Kannel Dies, 87; Led Heart Study

docs.snippet: William B. Kannel, a cardiovascular epidemiologist whose work helped to identify and sought to rout the culprits behind heart attacks, strokes and other cardiovascular diseases, died on Saturday in Natick, Mass. He was 87.     The cause was cancer,...

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Kannel was one of the principal researchers behind the life-changing Framingham Heart Study, which began in 1948 and continues today.

headline.seo: W. B. Kannel, Who Led Historic Heart Study, Dies at 87
headline.main: W. B. Kannel, Who Led Historic Heart Study, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: W. B. Kannel Dies, 87; Led Heart Study

docs.abstract: William B Kannel, cardiovascular epidemiologist who led innovative research into heart attacks, dies at age 87.
docs.snippet: Dr. Kannel was one of the principal researchers behind the life-changing Framingham Heart Study, which began in 1948 and continues today.
